title: The Shire
description: Frodo's home where he inherits the One Ring from Bilbo on his 111th birthday.

title: Rivendell
description: Elrond's realm where the Fellowship is formed to destroy the One Ring.

title: Moria
description: Dwarven mines where Gandalf falls battling the Balrog.

title: Lothlórien
description: Galadriel's golden forest realm where Aragorn and Arwen pledge their love.

title: Rauros
description: The falls where Boromir dies trying to take the Ring from Frodo.

title: Emyn Muil
description: Frodo and Sam escape Boromir and continue their journey to Mordor.

title: Helm's Deep
description: Massive fortress where men and elves defend against Saruman's forces.

title: Isengard
description: Saruman's stronghold, destroyed by the Ents at Gandalf's behest.

title: Pelennor Fields
description: The great battle of Gondor where the Rohirrim charge against Sauron's army.

title: Mount Doom
description: The volcanic mountain where the One Ring is destroyed by Gollum and Frodo.

title: Barad-dûr
description: Sauron's dark tower, destroyed when the Ring is unmade.

title: Minas Tirith
description: Capital of Gondor, attacked by Sauron's forces led by the Witch-king.

title: The Black Gate
description: Main entrance to Mordor where Aragorn and the forces of the West make their stand.
